item.title: IT Apprentice

item.description: This page on my blog serves as an index of technologies I’ve learned or became better at while working as an apprentice in IT. ðŸ˜€ It also serves the purpose of the required documentation apprentices in Norway are supposed to do. ðŸ¤ ðŸ˜³ It’s mostly in relation to stuff learned at SkyLabs AS where we run a captive portal service. But there is also some stuff from Sircon AS. Those guys run hosting services, with a focus on cPanel/WordPress shared hosting.
